core_loop: Towers of varied blocks sway with physics on screen. Tap/swipe a block from any rival tower to yank it out â€” it flies to the top of your tower. Your tower sways more with each addition. Each round lasts 30-60 seconds with a rising 'earthquake' rumble that intensifies wobble, forcing risky plays.
retention_hooks: Tower height is your high score â€” beat your record each round with a visible ghost-line marker

Combo streaks for stealing 3+ blocks without your tower wobbling past the danger angle
controls: Tap/click a block on any rival tower to steal it. Tap your own tower to 'brace' it momentarily (3-second cooldown), reducing wobble. That's it â€” one-finger play, fully mobile friendly.
